verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) I waited<WH6960> patiently<WH6960> for the Lord;<WH3068> And He inclined<WH5186> to me, and heard<WH8085> my cry.<WH7775>

He brought<WH5927> me up out of the pit<WH953> of destruction,<WH7588> out of the miry<WH3121> clay;<WH2916> And He set<WH6965> my feet<WH7272> upon a rock<WH5553> making<WH3559> my footsteps<WH9036> firm.<WH3559>

And He put<WH5414> a new<WH2319> song<WH7892> in my mouth,<WH6310> a song<WH8416> of praise<WH8416> to our God;<WH430> Many<WH7227> will see<WH7200> and fear,<WH3372> And will trust<WH982> in the Lord.<WH3068>

How blessed<WH835> is the man<WH1397> who<WH834> has made<WH7760> the Lord<WH3068> his trust,<WH4009> And has not turned<WH6437> to the proud,<WH7295> nor to those who lapse<WH7750> into falsehood.<WH3577>

Many,<WH7227> O Lord<WH3068> my God,<WH430> are the wonders<WH6381> which Thou hast done,<WH6213> And Thy thoughts<WH4284> toward<WH413> us; There<WH369> is none<WH369> to compare<WH6186> with Thee; If I would declare<WH5046> and speak<WH1696> of them, They would be too<WH4480> numerous<WH6105> to count.<WH5608>

Sacrifice<WH2077> and meal<WH4503> offering<WH4503> Thou hast not desired;<WH2654> My ears<WH241> Thou hast opened;<WH3738> Burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> and sin<WH2401> offering<WH2401> Thou hast not required.<WH7592>
Then<WH227> I said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH2009> I come;<WH935> In the scroll<WH4039> of the book<WH5612> it is written<WH3789> of me;
I delight<WH2654> to do<WH6213> Thy will,<WH7522> O my God;<WH430> Thy Law<WH8451> is within<WH8432> my heart.<WH4578> "

I have proclaimed<WH1319> glad<WH1319> tidings<WH1319> of righteousness<WH6664> in the great<WH7227> congregation;<WH6951> Behold,<WH2009> I will not restrain<WH3607> my lips,<WH8193> O Lord,<WH3068> Thou knowest.<WH3045>

I have not hidden<WH3680> Thy righteousness<WH6666> within<WH8432> my heart;<WH3820> I have spoken<WH559> of Thy faithfulness<WH530> and Thy salvation;<WH8668> I have not concealed<WH3582> Thy lovingkindness<WH2617> and Thy truth<WH571> from the great<WH7227> congregation.<WH6951>
Thou, O Lord,<WH3068> wilt not withhold<WH3607> Thy compassion<WH7356> from me; Thy lovingkindness<WH2617> and Thy truth<WH571> will continually<WH8548> preserve<WH5341> me.

For evils<WH9567> beyond<WH5704> <WH369> number<WH4557> have surrounded<WH661> me; My iniquities<WH5771> have overtaken<WH5381> me, so that I am not able<WH3201> to see;<WH7200> They are more<WH4480> numerous<WH6105> than<WH4480> the hairs<WH8185> of my head;<WH7218> And my heart<WH3820> has failed<WH5800> me.
Be pleased,<WH7521> O Lord,<WH3068> to deliver<WH5337> me; Make<WH2363> haste,<WH2363> O Lord,<WH3068> to help<WH5833> me.

Let those be ashamed<WH954> and humiliated<WH3637> together<WH3162> Who seek<WH1245> my life<WH5315> to destroy<WH5595> it; Let those be turned<WH5472> back<WH268> and dishonored<WH3637> Who<WH2655> delight<WH2655> in my hurt.<WH9567>
Let those be appalled<WH8074> because<WH5921> <WH6118> of their shame<WH1322> Who say<WH559> to me, "Aha,<WH1889> aha!<WH1889>"

Let all<WH3605> who seek<WH1245> Thee rejoice<WH7797> and be glad<WH8055> in Thee; Let those who love<WH157> Thy salvation<WH8668> say<WH559> continually,<WH8548> "The Lord<WH3068> be magnified!<WH1431>"
Since I am afflicted<WH6041> and needy,<WH34> Let the Lord<WH136> be mindful<WH2803> of me; Thou art my help<WH5833> and my deliverer;<WH6403> Do not delay,<WH309> O my God.<WH430>
